from gtts import gTTS
import os, uuid
quote = 'Believe in yourself. You are stronger than you think.'
filename = f'/data/data/com.termux/files/home/{uuid.uuid4()}.mp3'
tts = gTTS(text=quote, lang='en', tld='com')
tts.save(filename)
os.system(f'mpv --really-quiet {filename}')
os.remove(filename)
